title: Ticket #5327: Separate SPOOL for job files and service files
description:
I'd like to request a feature that would add a new configuration option to separate system files stored in SPOOL from the location used to store job data. Ideally files defined in SYSTEM_VALID_SPOOL_FILES could be stored in a location defined by something like SYSTEM_SPOOL while job stage-in and other related files would continue to be stored in SPOOL.

This was originally brought up and reasons outlined in OSG ticket https://ticket.opensciencegrid.org/26864.
